name: Goblin
stat_block:
**HP:** 1 Heart (10 HP)
**Armor:** 10
**Actions:** Rusty Blade (Weapon Effort), Scurry (move NEAR and hide)
**Loot:** 1d4 coin, rusty blade

Small, green-skinned scavengers. Always found in groups. Cowardly alone, dangerous in packs.

name: Skeleton
stat_block:
**HP:** 1 Heart (10 HP)
**Armor:** 12
**Actions:** Bone Blade (Weapon Effort), Reassemble (if destroyed, roll 1d6 — on 5-6 it reforms next round)
**Loot:** Ancient coin, bone fragment

Undead warriors animated by dark magic. They fight silently, relentlessly, until destroyed or their master falls.

name: Giant Rat
stat_block:
**HP:** 0.5 Heart (5 HP)
**Armor:** 10
**Actions:** Bite (Basic Effort), Disease (on a natural 1 defense, target is poisoned)
**Loot:** Rat tail, mangy pelt

Oversized vermin found in sewers, cellars, and ruins. Travel in swarms.

name: Zombie
stat_block:
**HP:** 2 Hearts (20 HP)
**Armor:** 8
**Actions:** Slam (Weapon Effort), Grab (STR check or target is grabbed, can't move)
**Loot:** Rotting gear, 1d4 coin

Slow but tough. Hard to put down. They keep coming. What they lack in speed they make up in relentlessness.

name: Bandit
stat_block:
**HP:** 1 Heart (10 HP)
**Armor:** 12 (leather)
**Actions:** Short Sword (Weapon Effort), Crossbow (Weapon Effort at FAR), Dirty Trick (target rolls DEX or is blinded for 1 round)
**Loot:** 2d6 coin, short sword, leather armor

Desperados, highwaymen, and cutthroats. Usually want your money, not your life — unless cornered.

name: Wolf
stat_block:
**HP:** 1 Heart (10 HP)
**Armor:** 10
**Actions:** Bite (Weapon Effort), Pack Tactics (if 2+ wolves attack same target, +3 to hit)
**Loot:** Wolf pelt, fangs

Clever pack hunters. Rarely attack groups unless starving. Can be tamed by skilled handlers.

name: Orc Warrior
stat_block:
**HP:** 2 Hearts (20 HP)
**Armor:** 14 (chain + shield)
**Actions:** War Axe (Weapon Effort +2), Shield Bash (target rolls STR or falls prone), Battle Cry (allies within NEAR get +2 on next attack)
**Loot:** 3d6 coin, war axe, chain armor, shield

Brutal fighters who live for combat. Stronger and tougher than goblins. Organized into war bands with clear hierarchy.

name: Giant Spider
stat_block:
**HP:** 2 Hearts (20 HP)
**Armor:** 12
**Actions:** Bite (Weapon Effort + poison: CON check or 1d4 damage per round for 3 rounds), Web (DEX check or stuck until freed with STR check)
**Loot:** Spider silk, venom sac

Car-sized arachnids lurking in webs in dark places. They wait patiently for prey to stumble in.

name: Ogre
stat_block:
**HP:** 3 Hearts (30 HP)
**Armor:** 12 (thick skin)
**Actions:** Club Smash (Ultimate Effort), Throw Rock (Weapon Effort at FAR), Stomp (all CLOSE targets roll DEX or take Basic Effort)
**Loot:** 4d6 coin, ogre teeth, big club

Massive, dim-witted brutes. One ogre is a serious threat. They collect shiny things and are easily tricked — but not easily stopped.

name: Mimic
stat_block:
**HP:** 2 Hearts (20 HP)
**Armor:** 15 (hard shell)
**Actions:** Bite (Weapon Effort), Adhesive (first attack sticks weapon to it — STR check to free), Surprise (always acts first in round 1)
**Loot:** Whatever it was pretending to be, plus 2d6 coin

Shapeshifting predators disguised as treasure chests, doors, or furniture. They wait for someone to touch them, then strike.

name: Troll
stat_block:
**HP:** 4 Hearts (40 HP)
**Armor:** 12
**Actions:** Claw/Claw/Bite (3 attacks at Weapon Effort), Regeneration (heals 5 HP per round unless burned)
**Weakness:** Fire stops regeneration for 1 round
**Loot:** Troll blood (alchemy ingredient), 3d6 coin

Lanky, green-skinned horrors that regenerate from almost any wound. Fire is the answer.

name: Wraith
stat_block:
**HP:** 2 Hearts (20 HP)
**Armor:** 14 (incorporeal — only magic weapons hit fully)
**Actions:** Life Drain (Magic Effort, target loses that many max HP until long rest), Phase (can move through walls)
**Loot:** Cursed ring, soul gem

Incorporeal undead bound to a location or object. Physical weapons deal half damage. Their touch drains life force.

name: Wyvern
stat_block:
**HP:** 4 Hearts (40 HP)
**Armor:** 15 (scales)
**Actions:** Bite (Ultimate Effort), Tail Sting (Weapon Effort + poison: CON check or paralyzed 1 round), Flyby (move FAR and attack without provoking)
**Loot:** Wyvern scales, poison stinger, 5d6 coin

Lesser dragon-kin with a deadly poisoned stinger. Territorial and aggressive. Can carry off a full-grown human.

name: Lich
stat_block:
**HP:** 5 Hearts (50 HP)
**Armor:** 18 (magical wards)
**Actions:** Eldritch Blast (Ultimate Effort at FAR), Summon Undead (2d4 skeletons appear), Power Word (one target rolls WIS or is stunned 1 round), Teleport (move anywhere within FAR)
**Phylactery:** Cannot be permanently killed unless phylactery is destroyed
**Loot:** Staff of power, spellbook, phylactery clue, 10d6 coin

Ancient sorcerers who traded their mortality for eternal undeath. Brilliant, patient, and terrifying. Always have a plan within a plan.

name: Dragon (Adult)
stat_block:
**HP:** 6 Hearts (60 HP)
**Armor:** 18 (dragon scales)
**Actions:** Bite (Ultimate Effort +3), Claw/Claw (2x Weapon Effort), Breath Weapon (all in a NEAR cone take Ultimate Effort, DEX check for half — recharges on 5-6 each round), Tail Sweep (all CLOSE targets roll DEX or are knocked FAR and take Weapon Effort), Frightful Presence (all within FAR roll WIS or are frightened 1 round)
**Loot:** Dragon hoard (massive), dragon scales, dragon blood

The apex predator. Ancient, intelligent, and devastating. A dragon encounter should be a campaign-defining event.
